name: Shunt Yard
description:
Welcome to Shunto's Rust Yard. 

Play as Shunto, the adorable block pushing robot and seeks to reactivate all the energy grids.  

Use WASD to move around and push blocks. If a block ends its move in an activation point, the energy grid will activate and the puzzle is complete. If a block ends its move on a mine it will explode and the puzzle will reset. Yellow blocks behave normally while purple blocks will bounce one block back off the edge of the grid. 

When blocks move on mud they will travel until they reach the edge of the grid or another block. When blocks reach gravel they immediately stop due to the friction.

Activate all 14 energy grids to complete the game.
